settings.grid-content: Relax in style in this season’s super-comfortable track pants and hoodies. Inspired by retro sportswear silhouettes, these flattering pieces are elevated via luxurious fabrications and playful detailing, in line with this season’s upbeat theme. They are the perfect alternative to a cashmere sweater, ideal for low-key weekends, long-haul flights and any time you need a little down time.

settings.title: How to Style a Hoodie
settings.text: Toeing the line between a laid back weekend outfit and suitable errand-running attire, a hoodie can be styled in a number of ways. Pair with track pants for ultimate comfort, or layer an oversized style on top of a basic tee and opt for your favourite straight-legged jeans instead for casual chic.

settings.grid-content:
Hoodies and knits of any gauges can form an essential part of your everyday rotation. Whether it’s cashmere, cotton or wool, each of our pieces is crafted from the finest and most delicate threads, so they require careful looking after. Here’s how to look after your cashmere knits.


You can machine or hand wash your cashmere; do so every three to four wears unless visibly soiled. Use a delicate or knitwear cycle, on a cold wash at the lowest spin. We also recommend a gentle detergent such as a specialist cashmere shampoo or baby shampoo. To dry, lie your cashmere jumper on a flat surface in its natural shape, and cool iron on reverse if needed.

Store folded - never hung - with cedarwood stars to keep moths at bay, and be sure to spritz with a garment refresher in between washes.

For a more detailed guide to washing your knits, please read our full cashmere care guide.

settings.title: Black Women’s Hoodies
settings.text: A staple colour and style that belongs in every woman’s capsule wardrobe - a Chinti & Parker black women’s hoodie. Pair perfectly with your favourite straight-legged jeans if you’re running weekend errands, or opt for our cosy track pants instead for off-duty evenings. Everyone knows black pairs well with everything, so you’ll never have to spend much time on outfit planning. Each of our pieces are made using the finest and softest fibres. With proper care, they’re sure to last you a lifetime - be sure to follow our care guide for the best advice.

settings.title: Women’s Charcoal Cashmere Sweaters

Each of our cashmere sweaters is carefully crafted from the finest fibres; soft to the touch, cosy enough for winter yet also cool enough for summer. It’s the perfect addition to your year-round rotation. Keep your new grey cashmere jumper looking as good as the day you bought it; follow the advice in our cashmere care guide.

settings.title: Women’s Cream Cashmere Sweaters
settings.text: Knitwear drawer looking a little dull? Why not introduce one or two of Chinti & Parker’s crisp cream cashmere sweaters into the mix? The freshest colour that will instantly revitalise any wardrobe, a cream jumper will always look bright, stylish and chic. Ours are crafted from sumptuously soft cashmere for the most luxurious finish that can be worn all year round. Whether you prefer a plain staple that can be dressed up with accessories, or pops of colour and that signature Chinti & Parker detailing for unexpected flair – your new perfect piece is right here. Ensure your sweater lasts for years, by following our cashmere care guide.

MAKE SMALL, GRADUAL CHANGES

Small, gradual changes can make working towards a more sustainable lifestyle appear less overwhelming, particularly for those at the beginning of their journey. Start out small, do your research, and forgive yourself for occasional and minor setbacks - nobody becomes the perfect ethical fashion consumer overnight.

settings.grid-content:
Introduce a dose of this season’s “it” colour into your everyday rotation with a women’s grey hoodie from Chinti & Parker. A staple shade that deserves a place in everyone’s wardrobe, one of our boxy hoodies in a must-have grey hue can be paired with almost any other shade.

Pair with track pants for off-duty evenings and weekends at home, or layer one over a basic tee and straight-legged denim when you’re running errands. Each of our hoodies is made from the softest yarns, guaranteed to keep you warm and comfortable. Keep your hoodie looking its best for years to come; simply follow the advice in our care guide.

Dark enough to pair well with almost any other shade, yet offering a touch more vibrancy than black, navy is ideal for colour introverts. To keep your hoodie as gorgeous as the day you bought it, follow the advice in our care guide.
